(That was the title of one of my fics but I think that Is apropiate, 
who will be the lucky who chacht thi pod?????)

:: MAximal Scout ship::

"We're loosing the control...." Said an scared voice

" DROP PODS!!!!!"

Few pods was dropped and the MAximal ship exploted, with it all pods 
were destroyed... excep one which fell among Predacons Bases and 
Alliance Base.

The pod came in stasis lock after it scan the DNA of an animal.
